title: In the redevelopment sites of existing filling and service station of Petrol, Diesel, Compressed Natural Gas or any other Motor Vehicle Fuel, change of usemay be permitted by retaining minimum area required as per these Regulations for existing filling and service station of Petrol, Diesel, Compressed Natural Gas or any other Motor Vehicle Fuel, for the uses as permissible under these Regulations with separate plot &access subject to NOC from Controller of Explosive and CFO
clause_text: In the redevelopment sites of existing filling and service station of Petrol, Diesel, Compressed Natural Gas or any other Motor Vehicle Fuel, change of usemay be permitted by retaining minimum area required as per these Regulations for existing filling and service station of Petrol, Diesel, Compressed Natural Gas or any other Motor Vehicle Fuel, for the uses as permissible under these Regulations with separate plot &access subject to NOC from Controller of Explosive and CFO.
